name: Total Extreme Wrestling 2013
description: Step into the ring. You’re the promoter and it’s your job to crush the competition by assembling, managing, and leading a roster of wrestling stars to victory.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista®, Windows® 7, Windows® 8, Windows® 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo, AMD Athlon™ X2, or equal at 1.6GHz or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX® compatible video card Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX® compatible sound card
